participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and friendly, always looking to connect with others.
participant_1.background: My favorite movie is Mean Girls. I own a cat and a dog. I'm a party animal. I am deathly afraid of heights.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and determined, eager to break free from parental control.
participant_2.background: I am 19 and I cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. They are constantly on my back. I work; I have a part-time job at Burger King. I just want to have fun with my friends. I do not drink or do drugs or anything.

content.text: I'M a mom or two and a teacher so I'm always on the run
